name: Journey to home (Ringo_di)
description:
Introduction

A lonely cat is trying to make her way back home. As she ventures forward, mysterious shadow appears, guiding her way through obstacles. Betwixt light and shadow, the difference between the living and the dead seemed not that distinctive anymore. Through the steel jungle, the clock is ticking fast; our furry little friend may still have a chance for the final reunion...

Credits:

Di Wen, Rouzhou Zhang, Yiyang Chen, Yi Chen, 

Yiyang Li, Feiyang Zhou, Naiyu Wang

Music

Stage 1: Eleven Forest by David Renda

Stage 2: Calm and Peaceful

Stage 3: Alex Productions Cinematic Piano Lights

Calm and Peaceful by LesFM https://lesfm.net/relaxing-background-music/

Music promoted by https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/
